pages.description: Creatives landing is a digital experience developed for Motiv Studio to attract creative clients.

pageContent.info: Lead frontend developer for Creatives landing, an interactive portfoli page built for Motiv Studio showcasing their creative projects and digital talent.

rows.heading: My Role
rows.text: For this project I was tasked with developing the enterity of the frontend experience. I designed and built out the architecture of the website from scratch, planning accordingly for the neccessary features to make this project shine: unique animations, slide-based scroll, and its variouse interactions.

pages.description: Ricochet landing was developed for Motiv Studio for a digital data analyses project called Ricochet.

pageContent.info: Ricochet landing is landing page I built for a startup app that helps businesses track important interacting metrics. The site is full of animation and interactions that keep potential users engaged while learning about the application.

imgData.alt: desktop screenshot of full Ricochet website

rows.heading: My Role
rows.text: For this project I was tasked with developing the enterity of the frontend experience once again. I designed and built out the architecture of the website from scratch, planning accordingly for the neccessary features to make this project shine: unique entry animations, and compelling layout.

pages.description: Zenfully landing was developed for Motiv Studio for a Binural Beats generating web application.

pageContent.info: Zenfully Landing page is a landing page I built for the web application Zenfully, a tool that helps users concentrate and sleep better.

imgData.alt: screenshot of the whole Zenfully landing website

pages.description: Zenfully App is a Binural Beats generating web application. Its intent is to help users concentrate and sleep better. I was brought on the project to work on specific components and functionality.

pageContent.info: Zenfully App is a Binural Beats generating web application. Its intent is to help users concentrate and sleep better. I was brought on the project to work on specific components and functionality.
